text: Ate uha rasula (sadesavahaka) hovega. Bani isara'ila vala ki maim tuhade la'i tuhade raba di nisani lai ke a'i'a ham. Mai' tuhade la'i miti de padi jihi murati bana'unda ha, phira usa vica phuka marada ham tam uha alaha de hukama nala asali pachi bana jandi hai. Ate maim alaha de adesa nala mam tom jame anhe ate kohari nu tadarusata karada ham ate maim alaha de hukama nala mritaka nu jivata karada ham ate tuhanu dasada ham ki tusim ki khande ho ate apane gharam vica ki bhadara karade ho. Besaka isa vica tuhade la'i nisani hai, jekara tusi visavasa rakhade ho
